segment.source: Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) extends the capabilities of the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) to provide comprehensive change control and improved management for Group Policy Objects (GPOs).
segment.target: Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) extends the capabilities of the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) to provide comprehensive change control and improved management for Group Policy Objects (GPOs).

segment.source: AGPM is available as part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP) for Software Assurance.
segment.target: AGPM is available as part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP) for Software Assurance.

segment.source: AGPM Version Information
segment.target: AGPM Version Information

segment.source: AGPM 4.0 SP3 supports Windows 10, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, and Windows Vista with SP1.
segment.target: AGPM 4.0 SP3 supports Windows 10, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, and Windows Vista with SP1.

segment.source: AGPM 4.0 SP2 supports Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, and Windows Vista with SP1.
segment.target: AGPM 4.0 SP2 supports Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, and Windows Vista with SP1.

segment.source: AGPM 4.0 SP1 supports Windows Server 2012, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, and Windows Vista with SP1.
segment.target: AGPM 4.0 SP1 supports Windows Server 2012, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, and Windows Vista with SP1.

segment.source: AGPM 4 supports Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, and Windows Vista with SP1.
segment.target: AGPM 4 supports Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, and Windows Vista with SP1.

segment.source: AGPM 3 supports Windows Server 2008 and Windows Vista with SP1.
segment.target: AGPM 3 supports Windows Server 2008 and Windows Vista with SP1.

segment.source: AGPM 2.5 supports Windows Vista (32-bit) with no service pack and Windows Server 2003 (32-bit).
segment.target: AGPM 2.5 supports Windows Vista (32-bit) with no service pack and Windows Server 2003 (32-bit).

segment.source: Supplemental MDOP Product Guidance
segment.target: Supplemental MDOP Product Guidance

segment.source: In addition to the product documentation available online, supplemental product guidance such as informational videos and virtual labs are available for most MDOP products.
segment.target: In addition to the product documentation available online, supplemental product guidance such as informational videos and virtual labs are available for most MDOP products.

segment.source: MDOP Videos
segment.target: MDOP Videos

segment.source: For a list of available MDOP videos, go to Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack Technologies Videos (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=234275).
segment.target: For a list of available MDOP videos, go to Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack Technologies Videos (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=234275).

segment.source: MDOP Virtual Labs
segment.target: MDOP Virtual Labs

segment.source: For a list of available MDOP virtual labs, go to Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP) Virtual Labs (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=234276).
segment.target: For a list of available MDOP virtual labs, go to Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP) Virtual Labs (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=234276).

segment.source: MDOP TechCenter
segment.target: MDOP TechCenter

segment.source: For technical whitepapers, evaluation materials, blogs, and additional MDOP resources, go to MDOP TechCenter (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=225286)
segment.target: For technical whitepapers, evaluation materials, blogs, and additional MDOP resources, go to MDOP TechCenter (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=225286)

segment.source: How to Get MDOP
segment.target: How to Get MDOP

segment.source: MDOP is a suite of products that can help streamline desktop deployment, management, and support across the enterprise.
segment.target: MDOP is a suite of products that can help streamline desktop deployment, management, and support across the enterprise.

segment.source: MDOP is available as an additional subscription for Software Assurance customers.
segment.target: MDOP is available as an additional subscription for Software Assurance customers.

segment.source: Evaluate MDOP
segment.target: Evaluate MDOP

segment.source: MDOP is also available for test and evaluation to MSDN and TechNet subscribers in accordance with MDSN and TechNet agreements.
segment.target: MDOP is also available for test and evaluation to MSDN and TechNet subscribers in accordance with MDSN and TechNet agreements.

segment.source: Download MDOP
segment.target: Download MDOP

segment.source: MDOP subscribers can download the software at the Microsoft Volume Licensing website (MVLS).
segment.target: MDOP subscribers can download the software at the Microsoft Volume Licensing website (MVLS).

segment.source: Purchase MDOP
segment.target: Purchase MDOP

segment.source: Visit the enterprise Purchase Windows Enterprise Licensing website to find out how to purchase MDOP for your business.
segment.target: Visit the enterprise Purchase Windows Enterprise Licensing website to find out how to purchase MDOP for your business.
